activities: Fa Yuan Gun Gun Inc. receives personal information from the EU in the course of operating our web site located at www.KeenWit.com. We use this information for processing payments, disbursing customers' earnings, and communicating with users regarding matters such as registration, order processing, promotional offers, and account activity notifications. We may also use this information for other purposes, such as authenticating users, personalizing content, supporting features of the site, and detecting fraud or other misuse. Third parties may use this information to carry out certain functions on our behalf.
